title: mono-face
content:
Hello to typophile community, I would like to submit to anyone this monospaced typeface I’ve seen on a catalogue. It reminds me something but really I can’t get it. So I would really appreciate if somebody could tell me what is its name.  
Thank you and sorry for my poor english.  
a.

author: a.moreu

comments.content:
Monospace 821 BT, also known as Helvetica Monospaced.

Jens

Isnt that EFF Swiss Monospaced...

[Swiss](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706103849/http:/www.buyfonts.com/professional_ps/swm.htm)
